TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlFileStream extends System.IO.Stream
Public NotInheritable Class SqlFileStream Inherits Stream
public ref class SqlFileStream sealed : System::IO::Stream

summary.span: 公開使用 FILESTREAM 資料行屬性儲存為位元組序列的 SQL Server 資料。

span.span: Exposes SQL Server data that is stored with the FILESTREAM column attribute as a sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來搭配`varbinary(max)`具有 FILESTREAM 屬性，在 SQL Server 2008 資料庫中儲存的資料。The class is used to work with `varbinary(max)` data stored with the FILESTREAM attribute in a SQL Server 2008 database. 您必須安裝.NET Framework 3.5 SP1 （或更新版本） 使用來處理 FILESTREAM 資料。You must install the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 (or later) to use to work with FILESTREAM data. 指定 FILESTREAM 屬性`varbinary(max)`資料行使得 SQL Server 將資料儲存在本機 NTFS 檔案系統而不是資料庫檔案中。Specifying the FILESTREAM attribute on a `varbinary(max)` column causes SQL Server to store the data in the local NTFS file system instead of in the database file. TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式提供在伺服器、 資料操作功能和 Win32 檔案系統介面提供了資料流資料的存取權。Transact-SQL statements provide data manipulation capabilities within the server, and Win32 file system interfaces provide streaming access to the data. > [!NOTE] > 無法直接從 NTFS 檔案系統開啟儲存在 FILESTREAM 資料行中的個別檔案。Individual files stored in a FILESTREAM column cannot be opened directly from the NTFS file system. 資料流處理 FILESTREAM 資料僅適用於 SQL Server 交易的內容。Streaming FILESTREAM data works only in the context of a SQL Server transaction. 類別衍生自類別，表示某個任意資料來源，例如檔案或記憶體區塊的位元組序列的抽象概念。The class is derived from the class, which represents an abstraction of a sequence of bytes from some arbitrary data source such as a file or a block of memory. 您可以將資料從資料流傳輸至資料結構，例如位元組陣列來讀取 FILESTREAM。You can read from a FILESTREAM by transferring data from a stream into a data structure such as an array of bytes. 您可以將資料從資料結構傳送到資料流寫入 FILESTREAM。You can write to a FILESTREAM by transferring the data from a data structure into a stream. 您也可以在資料流可讓您查詢及修改資料在資料流中目前的位置中搜尋。You can also seek within the stream, which allows you to query and modify data at the current position within the stream. 概念文件及程式碼範例，請參閱[FILESTREAM 資料](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/filestream-data.md)。For conceptual documentation and code examples, see [FILESTREAM Data](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/filestream-data.md). 如需安裝及設定 SQL Server 上的 FILESTREAM 資料的文件，請參閱[來設計和實作 FILESTREAM 儲存體](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=121499)SQL Server 2008 線上叢書 》 中。For documentation about setting up and configuring FILESTREAM data on SQL Server, see [Designing and Implementing FILESTREAM Storage](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=121499) in SQL Server 2008 Books Online.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出在堆疊中的所有呼叫端必須擁有要使用的程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 權限`SqlFileStream`建構函式。The following table lists the code access security (CAS) permissions that all callers in the stack must have to use the `SqlFileStream` constructors. |檔案存取File access|權限Permission| |-----------------|----------------| |讀取Read|| |WriteWrite|| |ReadWriteReadWrite| 和 and | 如需 CA 的詳細資訊，請參閱[程式碼存取安全性和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。For more information about CAS, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public SqlFileStream (string path, byte[] transactionContext, System.IO.FileAccess access);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path, unsigned int8[] transactionContext, valuetype System.IO.FileAccess access) cil managed
Public Sub New (path As String, transactionContext As Byte(), access As FileAccess)
public: SqlFileStream(System::String ^ path, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ transactionContext, System::IO::FileAccess access);

param.name: path
param.span: 檔案的邏輯路徑。

span.span: The logical path to the file.

param.span: 可在資料表的基礎 FILESTREAM 資料行上使用 Transact-SQL Pathname 函式來擷取路徑。

span.span: The path can be retrieved by using the Transact-SQL Pathname function on the underlying FILESTREAM column in the table.

param.name: transactionContext
param.span: 物件的交易內容。

span.span: The transaction context for the object.

param.span: 應用程式應該會傳回透過呼叫 GET_FILESTREAM_TRANSACTION_CONTEXT 方法所傳回的位元組陣列。

span.span: Applications should return the byte array returned by calling the GET_FILESTREAM_TRANSACTION_CONTEXT method.

param.name: access
param.span: 開啟檔案時要使用的存取模式。

span.span: The access mode to use when opening the file.

param.span: 支援的 列舉值是 、 和 。

span.span: Supported enumeration values are , , and .

param.span: 使用 時， 物件可以用來讀取所有現有資料。

span.span: When using , the object can be used to read all of the existing data.

param.span: 使用 時， 指向零位元組檔案。

span.span: When using , points to a zero byte file.

param.span: 物件關閉及認可交易時會覆寫現有資料。

span.span: Existing data will be overwritten when the object is closed and the transaction is committed.

param.span: 使用 時， 指向其中具有所有現有資料的檔案。

span.span: When using , the points to a file which has all the existing data in it.

param.span: 控制代碼位於檔案的開頭。

span.span: The handle is positioned at the beginning of the file.

param.span: 您可以使用其中一個 方法，在檔案內移動控制代碼的位置，以便寫入或附加新資料。

span.span: You can use one of the methods to move the handle position within the file to write or append new data.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果擲回例外狀況，應該會復原任何開啟的交易。If an exception is thrown, any open transactions should be rolled back. 否則，可能發生資料遺失。Otherwise, data loss can occur.

exception.span: 為 null 參考，或 為 null。

span.span: is a null reference, or is null.

exception.span: 為空字串 ("")，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

span.span: is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.

exception.span: 開頭為 "\\\\.\\"，例如 "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 "。

span.span: begins with "\\\\.\\", for example "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ".

exception.span: 呼叫至 NTCreateFile 所傳回的控制代碼不是 FILE_TYPE_DISK 類型。

span.span: The handle returned by the call to NTCreateFile is not of type FILE_TYPE_DISK.

exception.span: 包含不支援的值。

span.span: contains an unsupported value.

exception.span: 找不到檔案。

span.span: The file cannot be found.

exception.span: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

span.span: An I/O error occurred.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.

exception.span: 指定的 無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

span.span: The specified is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.

exception.span: 指定路徑的作業系統不允許要求的存取。

span.span: The access requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified path.

exception.span: 當 Write 或 ReadWrite 存取已指定，且檔案或目錄設為唯讀存取時，就會發生這種狀況。

span.span: This occurs when Write or ReadWrite access is specified, and the file or directory is set for read-only access.

exception.span: NtCreateFile 會失敗並傳回設為 ERROR_SHARING_VIOLATION 的錯誤碼。

span.span: NtCreateFile fails with error code set to ERROR_SHARING_VIOLATION.

Public Overrides Function BeginRead (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: override IAsyncResult ^ BeginRead(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 讀取資料的緩衝區。

span.span: The buffer to read the data into.

param.name: offset
param.span: 開始寫入自資料流讀取資料的「緩衝區」 位元組位移。

span.span: The byte offset in buffer at which to begin writing data read from the stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 要讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to read.

param.name: callback
param.span: 選擇性的非同步回呼，在讀取完成時呼叫。

span.span: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the read is complete.

param.name: state
param.span: 使用者所提供的物件，其可以從其他要求中區分出這個特定非同步讀取的要求。

span.span: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests

summary.span: 開始非同步的讀取作業。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: ，代表可能還在擱置中的非同步讀取。

span.span: An that represents the asynchronous read, which could still be pending.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援讀取。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.

exception.span: 此資料流不支援讀取資料。

span.span: Reading data is not supported on the stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read([out] unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 位元組陣列。

span.span: An array of bytes.

param.span: 當這個方法返回時，緩衝區會包含其值介於位移和 (位移 + 計數 - 1) 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的位元組取代的指定位元組陣列。

span.span: When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.

param.name: offset
param.span: 緩衝區中以零為起始的位元組位移，即開始儲存讀取自目前資料流之資料的位置。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 自目前資料流讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.

summary.span: 從目前的資料流讀取位元組序列，並依讀取的位元組數將資料流中的位置往前移。

span.span: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.

returns.span: 緩衝區所讀取的總位元組數。

span.span: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果目前無法取得足夠的位元組，則這個數目可能小於所要求的位元組數，如果已經到達資料流末端，則為零 (0)。

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.

exception.span: 此物件不支援讀取資料。

span.span: The object does not support reading of data.

summary.span: 取得或設定值 (以毫秒為單位)，該值決定資料流在逾時前將嘗試讀取多長時間。

span.span: Gets or sets a value, in milliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to read before timing out.

value.span: 可決定資料流在逾時前將嘗試讀取多長時間的值 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: A value, in milliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to read before timing out.

span.span: An array of bytes.

param.name: offset
param.span: buffer 中以零為起始的位元組位移，將會從該處開始將位元組複製到目前的資料流。
